none: Dumb Vision - A Total Commitment To Evil
Dumb Vision - A Total Commitment To Evil

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 30, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
I like this tape. DUMB VISION are going hard, the recording is murky and kinda fucked up so it sounds like you're in the basement with them. Classically catchy '90s DIY melodies clash with SPITS caliber irreverence and the casual way they drop in the weird bits ("Negative" as a perfect example) makes my hair stand up a bit. "Shadows" is the track though, the tracks that's gonna stick in your earholes like old, sticky wax. "Shadows" is a really good fukkn song.  A.T.C.T.E.
https://dumbvision.bandcamp.com/album/modern-things
